# GenstatHelpR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of GenstatHelpR is to collect useful convenience-functions created in the [Genetical Statistics and Systems Biology-group at the IMISE in Leipzig](https://www.genstat.imise.uni-leipzig.de/).

## Installation

When available, you can install the released version of GenstatHelpR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("GenstatHelpR")
```

Until then, you can install the package from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github(repo = "GenStatLeipzig/GenstatHelpR")
```


## Example

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(GenstatHelpR)



```
